articles.description: “If you look at the number of sites which have been deployed, we are present today in more than 60,000 sites, which cumulatively mean that we have deployed more than 3,50,000 5G cells across these 2300 cities,” said Thomas.
articles.content: NEW DELHI: 5G is driving the “Jio 2.0” opportunity, given the transformational impact that the fifth-generation technology will have in the home and the enterprise segments, said the telco’s presiden… [+2716 chars]
